original_text: For I will be unto Ephraim as a lion, and as a young lion to the house of Judah: I, even I, will tear and go away; I will take away, and none shall rescue him.
korean_text: 내가 에브라임에게는 사자 같고 유다 족속에게는 젊은 사자 같으니 바로 내가 움켜갈지라 내가 탈취하여 갈지라도 건져낼 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: For I will be unto Ephraim as a lion
and as a young lion to the house of Judah
I, even I, will tear and go away
